description: Ada & SPARK IntelliSense, code browsing, debugging and more.

ada.defaultCharset.description: The character set that the Ada Language Server should use when reading files from disk.

ada.displayMethodAncestryOnNavigation.description: Controls the policy for displaying overriding and overridden subprograms on navigation requests such as 'Go To Definition' or 'Go To Implementations'.
enumDescriptions: Never list overriding and/or overridden subprograms.
List overriding and/or overridden subprograms on dispatching calls and on abstract subprogram declarations.
List overriding and/or overridden subprograms on declarations only.
Always list overriding and/or overridden subprograms when possible.

ada.documentationStyle.description: Controls the primary documentation style of entities.
enumDescriptions: Default style, based on GNAT coding standard with some enhancements.
Documentation for the entities extracted from the comments before the entity declaration.

ada.enableDiagnostics.description: Controls whether or not the Ada Language Server should emit diagnostics into the VS Code Problems view.

ada.enableIndexing.description:
Controls whether the Ada Language Server should index the source files immediately after loading a project.

If set to false, indexing will be deferred to the time when an action requiring the index is first performed, e.g. hovering over a referenced entity to get its documentation.

ada.foldComments.description: Controls whether comments should be folded like code blocks.

ada.followSymlinks.description: Controls the Ada Language Server normalizes the file paths received from the client.

ada.gprConfigurationFile.description:
GPR configuration file (*.cgpr) for this workspace.

It is recommended to set this to a relative path starting at the root of the workspace.

ada.insertWithClauses.description: Enable insertion of missing with-clauses when accepting completion for invisible symbols.

ada.logThreshold.description: Controls the maximum number of trace files preserved in the ALS log directory (which defaults to `~/.als`). When this threshold is reached, old trace files get deleted automatically. The default number of preserved trace files is `10`.

ada.namedNotationThreshold.description: Defines the number of parameters/components beyond which named notation is used for completion snippets.

ada.onTypeFormatting.indentOnly.markdownDescription:
If the VS Code `editor.formatOnType` setting is enabled, the Ada Language Server will format Ada code while it is being typed in the editor, in particular when a new line is typed.

This setting controls whether formatting should only perform the indentation of the new line (true) or also format the previous line (false).

ada.projectDiagnostics.description:
Controls whether or not the Ada Language Server should emit project diagnostics into the VS Code Problems view.

Note: this setting is ignored if `ada.enableDiagnostics` is disabled and a workspace reload is necessary to refresh the diagnostics after modifying this setting.

ada.projectFile.description:
GPR project file (*.gpr) for this workspace.

It is recommended to set this to a relative path starting at the root of the workspace.

ada.relocateBuildTree.markdownDescription: The path to a directory used for out-of-tree builds. This feature is related to the [--relocate-build-tree GPRbuild command line switch](https://docs.adacore.com/gprbuild-docs/html/gprbuild_ug/building_with_gprbuild.html#switches).

ada.renameInComments.description: Enable editing Ada comments to update references to an entity when it is being renamed.

ada.rootDir.markdownDescription:
This setting must be used in conjunction with the `relocateBuildTree` setting.

It specifies the root directory for artifact relocation. It corresponds to the [--root-dir GPRbuild command line switch](https://docs.adacore.com/gprbuild-docs/html/gprbuild_ug/building_with_gprbuild.html#switches).

ada.scenarioVariables.description:
Scenario variables to apply to the GPR project file.

This value should be provided as an object where the property names are GPR scenario variables and the values are strings.

ada.showNotificationsOnErrors.markdownDescription: Whether to show error notifications for failing LSP requests.

ada.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the Ada language server in the 'Ada Language Server' Output view.
enumDescriptions: Brief traces are emitted for each request sent and each response received.
Verbose traces are emitted for each request sent and each response received, including the message content.

ada.useCompletionSnippets.description: Enable snippets in completion results (e.g. subprogram calls).

ada.useGnatformat.markdownDescription: Enable GNATformat as the formatting provider for Ada source files.

gpr.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the GPR language server in the 'GPR Language Server' Output view.
enumDescriptions: Brief traces are emitted for each request sent and each response received.
Verbose traces are emitted for each request sent and each response received, including the message content.
